availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, Attorney. Henry County, Kentucky, native. Married to Elizabeth Humphreys Durrett. Father of Lily Bates Durrett and William T. Durrett. Attended Georgetown University and Brown University, graduating in 1849. Graduated from the University of Louisville in 1850. Practiced in Louisville from 1850-1880. Editor of The Courier-Journal.

bibl.p: Americana (American Historical Magazine), Volume 8, Part 1 ed. (New York: National Americana Society, 1913), p. 3-5. Kentucky, Death Records, 1852-1964, Ancestry, Henry County, 1913.
